Our armies are crucial to our success â€“ we'll use them
to defend our lands, defeat our enemies and capture provinces.

An army is made up of individual units of troops
that we recruit. They cost money to build and maintain,
so we need to keep them busy to justify their upkeep.

Let's add some more units to our army.
We can recruit and reinforce armies from any of our cities.

The buildings present in a city decide the type and
quality of units available and can include cavalry, artillery and infantry.

Left-clicking a unit type, adds it to our recruitment queue.
It may take a number of turns before the unit becomes available.

Let's mobilise our new recruits. By holding shift we can
select our units by using left-click, then we can
right-click outside of the city to form a new army.

Without a General in charge, this army will lack leadership
and organisation. Let's merge them with our existing army
and bring them under the command of its General.
